name: Dan Moore
text: Blaze pizza was amazing.  I'm from St Pete and wanted something different so my sister took me here. Great food and great service from the staff. Definitely a great choice for something different.... Build a Pizza your way, you can choose anything you want on your pie, kinda like Subway, but with a better twist....

name: Jim isF
text: Great pizza place! We‚Äôve eaten at several different Blaze Pizza‚Äôs, even in different states & this has been the best one we‚Äôve been too. Super clean, food great, all ingredients looked really fresh & during this crazy coronavirus their ‚Ä¶More

name: Rollie Copp
text: Great pizza, made to order, baked in minutes. Cauliflower crust is great for those like us who are on a low carb diet.  Also had a dairy free cheese that is good for our grandson who cannot eat dairy. Servers friendly, but social distancing inside may be difficult, however we ate outside since it was such a nice day. Great place to eat.

name: cheryl welch
text: Been to Blaze pizza quite a few times with this past Sunday being the most recent visit  The staff is always pleasant and helpful. They make a delicious pizza to your liking. Enjoy coming here!.

name: Melissa Petersdorf
text:
Our first visit here! (My Daughter, My Husband and Myself)

Although we are local in Trinity and even though it was quite late and almost ‚Ä¶More

name: Orlando Rodriguez
text: First time eating Blaze pizza and I would say this is a different experience I've had eating pizza. Let's say it's like a Moe's but build your own pizza, or choose from a selected side of the menu. It took no longer than 15 minutes to order & be done out of the blazin' oven. Highly recommend the pesto glaze.

name: Luna Mystique
text: My first visit was a year ago today, so I celebrate by going back. Very thin crust pizza made to your order is amazing.

name: Stacey Mccabe
text: Love them my absolute favorite!!! Always fresh ingredients and best part they don't judge on how much cheese i need üòÅüòÅ

name: Rhonda Belin
text: Best pizza I have ever eaten.  Need to try this place.  Great customer service as well.

name: Lynda Whitty
text: So far the best pizza place in Pasco county, I've been there 4 times and ordered multiple times by food delivery apps. It's preferable to go to the location however, delivery is slow and the pizza cools down. I'm happy to drive 25 minutes down every once in a while, but if they open a location up here in Hudson I'd be there every week!

name: Alejandro
text: First time here and I‚Äôm loving it!! Delicious and build your own pizza right in front of you. Good selection of toppings and pizza sauces. Highly recommend:)

name: Victor Garcia Jr.
text: This place was so bomb! I love the idea of a build your own fast fire pizza place. The staff was quick and attentive and the food was really good at a reasonable price.

name: Sporty Blueman1159
text: Take a good pizza shop, make it like Subway for pizzas, and you have Blaze Chicken. Pretty Awesome place to walk down line and make your pizza as you choose. I really like this place. Prices are fair.

name: John W
text: Nice staff. Tasty pizza. Crust could have been cooked a little more. Good place for lunch.

name: Cathy Mirras
text: First time there.  I liked the fact that we could build our own pizza and that they don't charge for each item.  It was one flat price.  Salad was terrific and the lemon dressing was great.  We will go back

name: Zach Ginan
text: Nice little spot, very clean and pretty cool how they operate. The pizza on the other hand wasn‚Äôt very good. Ingredients are cheap and the thin crust wasn‚Äôt crispy. I‚Äôm a person who looks for quality in a pizza no matter the price anywhere ‚Ä¶More

name: Delana Noil
text: Pizza was soggy and the flavor fell flat for me and my family. We ordered the meat eaters pizza and it was hardly any meat on the pizza. Won‚Äôt be going back.

name: Diana Mertzlufft
text: Absolutely great service! They really do whatever you want to make the best pizza everrrr

name: Shawn Berg
text: Pretty good pizza for quick-serve. Their keto crust was great when we were on the keto diet. We even order it still today every now and again!

name: Shawn Berg
text: Pretty good pizza for quick-serve. Their keto crust is great if you're on the keto diet. We still order it once in a while today!

name: John Fuller
text: First time we tired Blaze Pizza. Very disappointed in their large pepperoni pizza. Bottom of crust and top edges were burned. To build a business you need to produce a quality product so customers will return. We are a one time customer who will not return.

name: Adam Montana
text: Blaze Pizza is a delicious pizza concept that blends Chipotle style ordering with thin crust personal pizzas that are in a class all their own. This particular location operates well and serves its customers with speed and effectiveness. You need to try it!

name: Elizabeth Cease
text: First time ever eating here tonight. The pizza and salad I got was amazing! I love this place!

name: Heather Kestler
text: First time customer. Picked up a BBQ Chicken pizza and a Simple Cheese pizza. 7 minute drive home. Pizza was still hot. So, that's good. The BBQ Chicken was way underdone. Popped that in the oven. (Note: this wasn't a take n bake). ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Leibowitz
text: I have to give it five stars today. The pizza was delicious if you don't mean VERY THIN! Service was pleasant and excellent. We shared a BLT entree salad which was delicious. (Ask for extra cheese)

name: Frances Skinner
text: I like that the pizza can be made any way I want it. Or, I can choose off their menu. Tasty!

name: Mohammad Al Azem
text: This place is awesome. We ordered the value pack meal, 2 large with 1 topping, 4 s'mores and entree salad. All food was delicious, the dough was amazing and not oily at all. Well done Blaze. Hopefully you keep up the good quality!

name: Steven Fruge
text: Love the food but last 2 visits all 4 pizzas were wrong. Contacted company and still no response after a week passed. I guess we are just not worthy. Well, plenty of other restaurants to visit.

name: Susan Tutko
text: Very pleasant workers, very friendly and fast. Lets not forget delish

name: Jeanne Rogers
text: CDC Guidelines being followed. Tried signature Buffalo chicken pizza. Very thin, crispy crust...awesome blend of topping flavors.

name: Leslyihh Fuentes
text: The service is good the pizza is immaculate! I enjoyed my time here. the manager Jojo was helpful too

name: Chris Garda
text: Pizza is not only good and affordable, it also is really fast! You watch it being made right in front of you as well.

name: Jill Breneman
text: Love Blaze Pizza üçï! Even have keto crust! Staff is always great! AJ went above and beyond and made dining in, which we don't do much of right now, a extra nice dinner.

name: Connor Burdett
text: Food was great. One pizza got burnt but A.J. Took care of everything very quickly!

name: Leslie Jusic
text: Fresh food and friendly staff. About $9 for your personal pizza with whatever toppings you want. It's great!

name: Wendy Price
text: Loved the crust, but the red sauce overpowered the pizza. Skimpy on the cheese and toppings. Great concept though.

name: Brooke Wilder
text: My husband and I recently moved to the area. We used to go to Mod Pizza in Houston area and we were sad there wasn‚Äôt one in the area. Luckily we found this place! It‚Äôs even better! I have a gluten allergy and my husband has a dairy allergy ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly NY
text:
I love the concept at Blaze pizza. Costumer service is outstanding at this location and the pizza was right on point!
Thank you.

name: Joel McEwan
text: I had high expectations. Called in the order they said it'd be ready in 22 minutes it was ready about 7 minutes early. Ordered extra cheese red onions mushrooms ham bacon and pineapple for my wife. The top of the pizza is covered almost ‚Ä¶More

name: J Jackson
text: High rise dough is my favorite way to go and worth every penny.

name: steve becker
text: Well order ahead as every night there seems to be a longer line out the door and down the street must be because this pizza just might be the best choice in Pasco County I have tried every pizza shop in the entire country might be a great pizza for leftovers to reheat as well

name: Scott McLarnon
text: Not terrible, but $16 for a keto pizza (burnt crust, by the way) and a medium drink? And it was medium size at best. We can do better elsewhere.

name: Pending Art
text: Great pizza. Fast service even with long lines. Highly recommend gluten free crust.  Staff was friendly and helpful.

name: ohmie G
text: Cauliflower crust burnt to perfection... Opted for BBQ sauce and it turned out amazing... Great place, can't wait to go back for PI day

name: Maro J
text: So yummy pizza it is different than regular pizza & salads too high recommend this place

name: Sean G
text: Loving this place, I get the take-n-bake build your own. Very affordable and they have good vegan options as well!

name: William Selwitschka
text: I was not impressed. While the service was great the pizza really is nothing to brag about. Papa John's or Marco's would be way better options and be cheaper at the same time. If you want great pizza I would not recommend this place.

name: Kevin Moore
text: Make your own delicious pizza !  The customer service is 10 stars

name: Chad Karr
text: Very good. Surprised us how good

name: Chris Woody
text: It's like ordering a sub at a Subway...but pizza.  Simple as that really.  The food is great though...staff are all good at what they do and cater to reasonable requests in the making process.  And not much wait time...you'd expect a pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Burton
text: Worst pizza I‚Äôve ever had. Crust is rubbery like a frozen pizza, sauce overly sweet and overly herbal. Would rather eat Red Baron over this.

name: Stir'IT'Up 4THEPEOPLE
text: Loved it fresh, not bad for cold pizza the next morning if your in to cold pizza.

name: Sunshine Adams
text: I ordered Pizza for my daughter's school for teacher appreciation week. They were awesome cashier was super professional and polite. They even put a little message on the pizza box for me.

name: Carlos Sureda
text: Good pizza, my wife loves the Caesar salad here

name: John Michael
text: Love this place!  My pizza is always made as ordered, and waiting for me when I show up to get it.  Furthermore, Blaze has healthy options that are extremely tasty.  Try it, you'll be hooked.

name: Jayleen Baez
text: My daughter gets to choose her toppings and they love to serve her!!

name: SpegTacular
text:
This place is great! It's basically the Subway of Pizza restaurants to say it in short. For less than $20, I can feed a family of 4 and have food to take home.
*The pizza is not as tasty as a NY-Style pizzeria but it's certainly above ‚Ä¶More

name: Paige S
text: One of the best pizzas I've had. Baked to perfection! No thick chewy crust. My favorite you ask, oh, The garlic pesto sauce is so good I've never had anything like it, it's not salty!! Top off with ovo mozzarella tomato basil and olive oil ‚Ä¶More

name: neil chivington
text: Excellent pizza made the way you want, and fast.  order on line is the best, but can do it by phone.  Phone orders take a while to get thru to someone.

name: Dj Bruda
text: We absolutely love this place. Amazing vegan options. Seriously so so good.

name: mark speir
text: always fast courteous and delicious... whether delivery carry out or eating in.

name: Jo Ann Shayhorn
text: I get the pick two and enjoy a salad and half a pizza.  My salad of choice has recently been the roasted squash with pineapple lime vinaigrette - DELICIOUS! And I can customize any pizza or make my own with lots of fresh toppings - like roasted garlic and ricotta cheese - FANTASTIC.

name: Rebecca Kremkau
text: So good. Staff is so nice and helpful. Yummy!

name: Swammy Swammy
text: This place was clean & had friendly staff.  As far as the Pizza Is concerned I would call this Fast Food Pizza. Not Bad but Not Great! The people that are giving this Place a 4 Star rating obviously don't know what a Great Pizza Is. No Comparison to a Real Italian Pizza Restaurant!

name: Lela Massey
text: yeah I probably eat here too much, love build your owns because you can literally add whatever you want and how much you want. It's great. Staff is exceptional üëåüèæ though the pizza typically need to be cooked a little longer for the crisp edge

name: brandon lawson
text: I first saw this place in Texas and now there here in Florida yessss great pizza for a great price!

name: Crystelle Miranda
text: The folks there are kind, generous, helpful. They have a great system & their pizza is delicious. My kid hates cheese on pizza but he has them just put a small amount on his "Simple Pie" and he eats half the pie every time!

name: Ashley Gregg
text: I had a wonderful experience at the new Blaze Pizza on 10/20/19. They not only have keto friendly options, but when I mentioned I was allergic to a couple of ingredients they all immediately changed gloves, told the pizza cutters to get a ‚Ä¶More

name: Bryan Phifer
text: Great first time visit.  Tons of options and customization for individual likes.

name: Steven Tongco
text: The food is always good. I like that you can build your own pizza and try different ingredient combinations. At peak times it can take a while to get through the line so you might want to order online to pick up or dine in.

name: Melvin Carcamo
text: I come by often ever since the location has been open. Each time I go my pizza taste great and the team always seem happy to be there. I finally met the General manger I believe her name is Jojo, she came to my table to make sure everything was to my liking.

name: Jan VanHoy Weaver
text: 1st time there. Place was busy and Noisy maybe better with less customers. Food was good quality, flavorful but Overpriced. I don't mind paying more if  Portions are Large! We had 2 small salads and Large pizza; which was size of Small pie @ another Pizza place! Bill was $30.00.

name: jameson allen
text: One of the cheapest places to get a good little pizza and the drink selection is really good

name: Kryptron
text: Great pizza. Best chain pizza we've tried. tasty sauce and cheese perfectly cooked in the fire oven. Delicious and consistent.

name: Carol M
text: Really amazing pizza! Great selection of dough. Gluten free, keto,  cauliflower, thin (regular) and high rise. I went with regular with the standard marinara sauce. So crispy and perfectly cooked. The toppings!!! Fresh basil!! Whole roasted ‚Ä¶More

name: Robin Jones
text: I'm gluten free due to an allergy. When you order the gluten free crust, they ask if it's an allergy. If so,  they do a glove change and that person uses fresh gloves as to try and not allow cross contamination as much as possible.  Pizza was delicious!

name: Sia Noya
text: My first time here was awesome! I waited until the line somewhat died down to go but even then they‚Äôre a bit long, however, it moves much faster than I anticipated. There was an employee named Louis who actually held the door open for me ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Shelley
text: I dined in on Monday night and it was such a pleasant restaurant! Great friendly staff, Ethan really helped us navigate through the menu! Such a fun and great energy and amazing food! Definitely will be back again !

name: Kimmy Nvan
text: Everyone was so nice. After making so many pizza a day they still do a great job creating each pizza as a team. Great team work and will be coming back!

name: CE Behr
text: I'm really starting to like this joint, and it looks like a whole bunch of other people are as well. I always ask them to make sure it's well done, but I absolutely love how you can just pick whatever it is that you want on your own ‚Ä¶More

name: Neuro Zee
text: Production line pizza customized as you watch it being made.Nice thin crusty pies. Interesting varieties. Don't be spooked by long queue; it moves fast.

name: Kristen Pulido
text: The cauliflower crust is amazing!

name: Emily Frank
text: Great food service wasn't very good. There is a cold group of people behind the counter..

name: Gina Anne
text: Amazing food every time I go! Been to the one in Daytona and I think I like this one a tad bit more. Friendly staff, exceptional service,  and always helpful.

name: ANNIE MILLER
text: I LOVE Blaze Pizza! I was so excited to see the new location near my house. The good was great and the staff was friendly.

name: Jason
text: Love this place. Tons of topping to choose from always fresh and clean.

name: Sal Catrini
text: Both my wife and I got sick from it. Told them easy on cheese 3 times and they still kept going we had cauliflower crust and both were badly burned. A horrible experience .staff couldn't care less.then they asked for a tip no service  what so ever

name: Richard Cooper
text: Good 'za made to order right in front of you.  Cooked in a stone oven.  Good service.  Usually busy so may wait for seating if large party.

name: Lindsey Boissy
text:
THANK YOU FOR OPENING A BLAZE IN TRINITY!!
super friendly staff!!! I had high expectations cause I go to the Disney springs one all the time when I‚Äôm in Orlando, and it was just as good pizza and staff! so happy!

name: Jenn Noseworthy
text: Good pizzas good salads good fruit drinks

name: Liz Larsen
text: The food was amazing. The service was beyond my expectations. Great place and great food. The line is always long, but it goes extremely fast. Don't let it discourage you.

name: Paul Jackson
text: This is a fantastic place to go to if you would like a customizable pizza to your tasting. It very much is like a Chipotle but with pizza. This place gets very busy so make sure to order a head if you can on their mobile app. Their mobile app also has rewards and can give you some pretty good deals sometimes.

name: Arielle Richardson
text: I ordered through the app. My first time eating here. They have cauliflower pizza and it was delicious. So excited.  I can treat myself and not cheat myself!!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Rhodene Mathis
text: This was my first time at this restaurant.   I enjoyed the pizza and salad.  A little pricey so not a lunch place everyday.  But still good.   Staff was friendly, & restaurant was very clean.

name: Veronica Bowie
text: Cool place. Great service. Helpful. You can make your own pizza and pick your toppings.

name: eric kurgan
text: Great food... Although always seems crowded, not so much seating you almost seem rushed. Decent service.

name: Liliana Hernandez
text: Delicious..I love this place üòã

name: Nicholas Johnson
text: Oh my god they have great pizza! Cheap price too can't beat it. Must try...fyi try at lunch. Dinner time is nuts.

name: Vanessa Barber
text: Food was delicious! Salads are a good size. Tried tried the cauli crust today and it was so yummy!

name: Sheilagh Yeh
text: Fresh ingredients, great options for both crust styles and for toppings. Friendly staff. I like that they offer a keto crust as well as a cauliflower one in addition to regular styles (additional price). Tasty pizza :) Busy, lively place.

name: Grace Lasprilla
text: I been going into blaze since they open and I love it there!!! There‚Äôs one employee named Julia I think and she always working when I come in. She is absolutely the best at recommending things and always so nice and funny to talk to while in the line.

name: Danica Mclaren
text: Went here for the 1st time today. I ordered online as I heard the line is always out the door - I'm glad I did! I got the cauliflower crust loaded with veggies and it was delicious! So glad this place offers wheat free options. I will be back alot!!! Great food, great service!

name: David Rodgers
text: 4 OF us had Blaze Pizza for the first time in Florida and it was AWESOME! 2 weeks later they go back tothe same place in Florida still awesome! My fiancee and I also go to the one in Cranberry, PA the same day and for the first time around here and it was mediocre at best!

name: Eva D'Apollo
text: Pretty good although nothing beats New York!

name: James Hession
text: Excellent place, service, and food. The build your own pizza's are a great option but flat price on unlimited toppings is gold.

name: Ana Herrera
text: Service always great here. My favorite pizza place. Aleah was my cashier. Great personality (:

name: Lisa K
text: Great place.   Fresh toppings.   Friendly staff.   Clean.   Excellent flavor combination.   I will definitely be back.

name: Lewis Fowler
text: Good pizza; a bit pricey though. Very busy, but they kept up with the load of customers quite well.

name: William Arnold
text: Place is amazing! Very good pizza! Only think they really need to practice more is cutting it equally. I‚Äôll have a thin slice in my hand, and the next slice is a giant slice I can barely hold. Got annoying.

name: Greg Tischner
text: They advertise a pizza that's, "Fast Fired", and "Our oven dome temperature can reach upward of 900F, while the floor temperature typically ranges from 600F to 800F". The evening I was there getting pizzas to go, last week, the digital ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa McIntosh
text: Delicious. All of the staff were friendly and kind.

name: Jacob Lee
text: Love blaze. As much as I like a whole pizza, the you pick two deal gives you unlimited topping on half a pizza with a whole salad or garlic knots to eat.

name: Big Boy Airbrush co
text: Best pizza place to go. Making it how you want is so great. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend

name: Niker Bacher
text: 2nd time they have totally botched my order. How do you even make a pizza without cheese and not even second guess it? How does this get out the door? Well at least they got the 'Blaze'd part right..

name: Connor Bacca
text: Great service! I went into the restaurant at an extremely busy time and had a great experience. I believe her name was Brooke who was extremely friendly and helped me make my pizza. Thank you!!

name: renaee clapp
text: Keto pizza was amazing!! Customer service was horrible!!!

name: Melissa Elliott
text: Pretty good but nothing really special. Muh

name: Erin Philips
text: Stopped in last night me and my husband each ordered a pizza Togo both were burnt on the bottom and not cooked all the way on top

name: Ben Fox
text: I love Balze. Friendly staff. Gotta have blaze at least once a week.

name: Pamela Oliver
text: Love this place a bit pricey but you are able to create exactly what you want and done in no time at all.

name: Daniel Duncan
text: I got the all meats pizza it had no flavor at all. Very disappointed...

name: Nichole Rodriguez
text: Totally cool to see your pizza made start to finish and yummy!

name: Nancy & Missy McCall & Young
text: It's a great Place to eat Pizza salads wonderful nice out the sphere what's a little outdoor seating area as well very good food

name: Chris Newtown
text: I know that the line was out the door, however, one of the goals is it is standardized. I know you were trying to push guests through to get the line down. However, pushing out pizza before its fully done just to get the line down the ‚Ä¶More

name: SavannaRowan Billingham
text: I had really high hopes for this place since their menu looked really good and I‚Äôd heard nothing but good things from other people. However, I can say I am thoroughly disappointed and will not being trying Blaze again any time soon if at ‚Ä¶More

name: Allyson Kangelaris
text: This was a good place. Until I postmated food. I ordered from THEIR menu. They didn't have the salad I ordered becuase they no longer sell it, instead of CALLING ME, they sent me lettuce and bacon, only. Didn't even replace with a ceaser. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tara Hildebrand
text: Fast-pizza  and a salad in approximately 5 to 10 minutes. We were very pleased.

name: Cloey Cremeans
text: Was super excited to get my first pizza, I work across the street and ordered online, great prices for the build your own pizza but when I got my pizza it was under cooked, doughy, even the pepperoni wasn't cooked! Was very disappointed :(

name: D.M.C
text:
Taste was great, price was good...
Kids were happy will return

name: mimi etienne
text: I love Blaze pizza! I like the fact I can build my own pizza with unlimited toppings and options for bread :) the employees are always nice too.

name: Joey Wythe
text: I have a tomato allergy and Anna is always nice and makes sure to change gloves and not cross contaminate the food

name: Andrew Kleczka
text: If you're going to have a promotional day, make sure you have enough pizza not to run out incredibly early. Bad way to open a new restaurant. Horrible first impression...at least offer some coupons or deals. Instead, they rushed us away without any compensation.

name: oliveros 1
text: Amazing staff, great pizza üòä

name: Yamileth Amaya
text: I love coming to this place, I was there for lunch the other day and AJ was my cashier, he was happy and full of positive energy, the restaurant was clean and the staff making the pizzas were very fast and friendly! AJ was amazing thank you for telling me about the app!!!! I‚Äôll be back.

name: Stephen Dillon
text: I went after the opening rush died down. The pizza was good and topics were pretty standard/good quality.. they had some toppings that I dont normally see elsewhere. Pizza and a drink will run around $10. We will definatly be regulars here if the quality and service remain as it is.

name: David Alexander
text: Blaze Pizza is a unique experience. Building your own pizza with all the possible ingredients is fun and delicious

name: Samantha McGowan
text: 3 of us went on a Friday night. It was very busy so I thought they was a good sign. My husband ordered the meatlovers while my brother-in-law & myself built our own. The sausage on the meatlovers pizza was not very good. The sauces could be ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Caruso
text: My son loves there pizza, we go about once a week and it's always clean and staff is friendly. If there is a line just wait a minute and it will gone, the staff works fast and it only takes maybe 5mins from order to pizza ready.

name: Michael Menendez
text: Great pizza!

name: Michael Cooke
text: Excellent build your own pizza restaurant with a lot of toppings and dietary needs.

name: Dora Balla
text: Fast effective system  and service. Good combination of ingredients on pizzas.

name: Brett Pruden
text: We like getting unlimited toppings

name: Steven Kielbasa
text: Lines usually move pretty quick but can get long during peak hours. Everything is always cooked to order, so is hot and fresh.

name: Shannon Dupuis
text: Always great food, made exactly how you wanted it, for a decent price, and a friendly staff. What more could you want?

name: Aysiah's world
text: I love this place! Great food and very good pricing. ‚ù§

name: Rtia Jones
text: It's the best pizza in my area.  Love it.

name: Amy Collotta
text: Quick and easy. Pizza was hot and good. Salad was great ... will visit again!

name: Dave
text: I thought it was great all the fresh toppings right in front of you to see and to pick out and the crust was thin finally a good thin crust pizza haven't been able to find one yet only been down here a couple of years but this is the first ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael C
text: Very busy, but very good. Fast service though.

name: Jeana
text: We have been to another location and loved it but we just weren‚Äôt impressed this time around at this new location, they had burnt the keto pizza, it was so busy we didn‚Äôt stop and ask them to remake it because the line was out the door, we ‚Ä¶More

name: James Price
text: Good, fast pizza.  Remember the hot tomato sauce is very hot.

name: William Mccallum
text: Fast food not great food, but very nice staff.

name: Tres Smith
text: Like Subway you choose your toppings and its made fresh

name: Nichole Cox
text: First time ever trying Blaze and this will forever be my new pizza spot. Excellent!

name: Kim Barber
text: I wasn't very impressed with their keto crust. Tasted a bit like cardboard to me, but I'm fussy about keto pizza crust. I'll try the cauliflower next time. It was a bit pricey for what I got.

name: Eric Granger
text: Thanks for the burnt pie. No more internet orders for me.

name: Alan Gockley
text: Make your own pizza. And it was so good. Try this place!!!

name: Melbourne Edwards
text: Not bad at all for first time visiting, I know it's a new location.

name: Cassandra Allen
text: Great experience for how busy it was! People were very friendly and food was delicious.

name: Becky Carter
text: I love this place, the pizza is so good..

name: Chloe Raynes
text: Sooooooo Florida never gets cold but today it's 50 degrees. We were inline not blocking the door way but we're still asked to go back outside and stand outside and wait even though in 2 seconds we would have been outta the way. I get it's a fire hazard to block the door but seriously... There's no reason to be rude.

name: kikito VDC
text: Best unique Pizza in the world

name: G. Johnson
text: GREAT!  I see why Lebron invested in this place. Garlic cloves, fresh basil, quality mozzarella and parmesan.  Really enjoyed it and will be back!!

name: Amber Johnson
text: It was pretty good! I enjoyed my meal.

name: VALERIE Marciano
text: Pizzas are delicious,service is fast and the staff is friendly and helpful

text: They provided great customer service and the pizza was delicious. Love the fact it‚Äôs like your own personalized pizza.

name: Jcc Infla

name: Marco Gerges
text: My favorite pizza place in the entire world!

name: richard neptune
text: Waited in a line out the door to have them tell me they didn‚Äôt have Keto crust when I got to order. If they are out of something it should be posted so you don‚Äôt waste a half hour in line!!!

name: Mark Lytle
text: Quick service and good pizza

name: Lacy G
text: Great service,  food amazing and vegan, even asked if we wanted them to change there gloves. Just awsome

name: Angelica Palau
text:
Pizza was ok, ready in minutes. Though, the environment was a bit loud and my kids were getting fussy due to the large crowd, loud dining area with people standing over us being the space is not too large. That being said, we cut our visit short and took our pizzas to go.
Pizzas were great.

name: Misty Space
text: Liz is my favorite worker there! She‚Äôs very nice :)

text:
